title: An Evil Tale
description: Elizabeth has lived in the orphanage her whole life, her parents unknown, even her name was given to her by the orphanage matron. Yet, plans were set in motion a millennium ago when her parents sent her to the future from another world, to escape a horrific war between the sorcerous Magi and the technologically advanced Veren. Now, she will find herself whisked back into that world, back home, to where her name means death but she can learn the gifts of her bloodline to survive.
author: A.E. Dark
